description:
The Takamachi family and Tsukimura family go to an onsen together. Nanoha and the others were relaxing in the onsen, but Nanoha can`t stop thinking about the girl in black...Fate...who she met the day before. What is the destiny of the two magical girls when Fate`s familiar, Alf also appears and they fight once more?!
Source: Amazon

titles.title: Koko wa Yu no Machi, Uminari Onsen na no
This Is Like a Town of Hot Water, the Uminari Hot Springs!
To jest jak Miasto Gorącej Wody, Gorące Źródła Uminari!
ここは湯のまち, 海鳴温泉なの
